location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:This black and white photograph shows Hazam Fort in Oman from the outside, with trees on either side of the fort. In front of the fort are three groups of men in traditional Omani dress standing in detachments with Omani flags. Two other men are also visible on the ground, and there are several men standing on the roof of the fort.Inscriptions:Printed label on the reverse of the image: ‘No.8. HAZAM Fort. 11 a.m.’
